document_data.name: ''Magical Sand''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Magical sand'''''  referred to the various types of magical [[sand]]y substances found throughout [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{Cite dragon/226/Campaign Classics: Magical Sands of Zakhara}}
document_data.Description: Similar to magical dusts, magical sand was often found in a sack or jar. Typically, an entire handful of magical sand was required in order to activate the sand's enchantment. A sack or jar of magical sand held 11-20 handfuls, making them relatively heavy and cumbersome.
document_data.Powers: The magical powers of magical sand varied greatly, but all had an effective throwing range of about {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} and acted upon an area no wider than {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}.
